pages.text: Earth spells can be found in mineshafts or Desert Temples

pages.title: Rumble
pages.text: Creates an earthquake that slows targets and shakes the screen (configurable) of affected players. $(li)Mana Cost: 40 $(li)Range: 20

pages.title: Crush
pages.text: Instantly destroys and drops the targeted block. Only works for pickaxe mineable blocks up to iron level. $(li)Mana Cost: 2

pages.title: Spike
pages.text: Creates a spike underneath the target that flings them up and makes them take damage if landed upon. $(li)Mana Cost: 20 $(li)Range: 10

pages.title: Terrain Toss
pages.text: Launches a chunk of terrain that deals damage and high knockback $(li)Mana Cost: 15
